content.raw:
Hi Achim,

thanks for the feedback. I'm trying to figure this out, but not sure where to look right now. The installer works on the only Win7 x64 machine we can try it on at the moment, and it also has Python 2.7.5 installed.

Does the problem only occur with the latest version of the installer? I added the previous one back on the PyPI page.

[Here](http://stackoverflow.com/a/14339295/1258041) is another thing we can try to diagnose this (we'll try it with your dump file here).
